First of all, I am reviewing this game to help my team for the '19 summer sales.

CS:GO is a game I 1000+ hours in, and after playing for more than two years my highest rank is only Gold Nova Master, which is 10 ranks in. I am someone who likes to play strategically, and that is why I enjoy playing this game so much. I mostly play alone since most of my friends aren't as good as me, and I have faith in the teammates I get. However, just like Siege or any other strategy based shooters, playing with randoms may be a bit of an issue. Ever since CS:GO became free, more and more smurfs, trolls, and hackers have come along, so I recommend playing a bit until you can get and afford 'Prime' where you only match with players who have prime as well. I play to win as I get more enjoyment from doing so, than just messing around. If you want to mess around there are non-competitive game modes such as: Deathmatch, Arms Race (Gun Game), Wingman (2v2. Although competitive, if you play with a friend you can have a lot of fun), and Casual (modified competitive rules, no ranks). 

If you pick it up, I hope you have fun!

CS GO kann witzig sein man kann gute teammates bekommen und neue leute kennen lernen. ABER es gibt auch viele schlechte seiten von cs go. Die salty russen, dumme teammates  und so weiter und so fort. Am besten ist man das man mit freunden spielt wäre mein tipp. Wer besser werden will MUSS Trainings machen. Bitte keine cheats runter laden die machen euch auch nicht viel besser. CS GO ist ein solides game. Das game hat viele schlechte seiten aber gibt es eine zweite oder noch eine chance. 

Das game kriegt von mir 8 / 10
